project_abstract.cdata: The objective of the Welfare Reform Project is to support the development of a more efficient and effective social welfare system. The project components are five in number: (1) improving the Social Insurance Department's implementation of social insurance policy, and the State Social Insurance Fund's budget management and administration; (2) supporting safe, supervised privately-managed retirement plans for the Latvian public; (3) improving the Social Assistance Department's performance in developing policy, and the municipalities in delivering local service; (4) helping to implement, monitor, and evaluate the welfare Ministry's social policy agenda; and (5) project coordination.
